• Multiplayer mining game with real-time synchronization using MQTT broker.
  • Procedural map generation with ores, tools, upgrades, and station shop.
  • Mobile controls, chat system, admin features, and cloud save functionality.
  • Sound engine with music, sfx, and dynamic engine sounds based on player actions.
  • Teleporter network for fast travel and persistent player statistics.

Mega Miner Online is a collaborative mining game where players dig for resources, upgrade equipment, and build structures. The game features real-time multiplayer through MQTT, procedural world generation, and a comprehensive upgrade system. Players can teleport using discovered relays, manage inventory, and interact with others through chat. The game includes sound effects, music, and mobile controls for an engaging experience across devices.
